title: Soulside
description: Soulside is the first social media for the metaverse. It is a soulful and positive alternative to the usual social media apps that let you create 3D posts. Our brain perceives the world in 3D, now there is a brain-friendly 3D social media. We focus on positivity and personal values.  Normally you have a screen, on Soulside you have 4 walls and the space in between. We are living the beginning of a metaverse world.
